on line.translation[0].definitions[0].de: using a computer to get information or to communicate with people
on line.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: You can book tickets on line.
Most of our sales staff now work on line.
on line.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a new nuclear reactor which should be on line by 2005
If there is a power failure, the emergency generators should come on line within 15 minutes.
